<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mask of Fear](/Feats.aspx?ID=2423) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 51 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Warmask](/Feats.aspx?ID=2415)

**Trigger**
You start your turn with the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition.

**Requirements**
You're wearing your _warmask_.

</column>

---

Your _warmask_ burns off of your face, releasing your apprehension. You remove the frightened condition. Your _warmask_ is destroyed, and you can't reapply it until your next daily preparations.

**Special** You can use this free action even if you have a condition tied to the frightened condition that would normally prevent you from using a free action, such as “[fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) as long as you're frightened” or “[paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) as long as you're frightened.”
name: Mask of Fear
